original_text: And of her that is sick of her flowers, and of him that hath an issue, of the man, and of the woman, and of him that lieth with her that is unclean.
korean_text: 불결기의 앓는 여인과 유출병이 있는 남녀와 그리고 불결한 여인과 동침한 자에 대한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And of her that is sick of her flowers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 유출로 병든 그녀에 관하여

sentences.original_text: and of him that hath an issue
and of him that lieth with her that is unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 부정한 그녀와 함께 누운 그에 관하여
